title: The Matrix
overview: A computer hacker discovers the nature of reality and fights agents in a simulated world. Action|Sci-Fi

title: Inception
overview: A thief who enters dreams is given a task to implant an idea. Action|Adventure|Sci-Fi

title: Interstellar
overview: A team travels through a wormhole searching for a new home for humanity. Adventure|Drama|Sci-Fi

title: The Dark Knight
overview: Batman faces the Joker, who threatens Gotham City. Action|Crime|Drama

title: Pulp Fiction
overview: The lives of multiple criminals intertwine in tales of violence and redemption. Crime|Drama
